item.title: Faces on the news
item.description: depending on the niche the tool still gives either today’s news or news close to the date, unfortunately I can’t fix it yet. 3. perplexity finds media related to the niche (like this step, cause you can find most interesting news there) and searches for news. 2. chatgpt writes queries relevant to the niche + today’s date and sends them to perplexity.

item.title: Gumloop, founded in a bedroom in Vancouver, lets users automate tasks with drag-and-drop modules | TechCrunch
item.description:
Image Credits:
Gumloop
Brodeur-Urbas claims that teams at Instacart and Rippling are using Gumloop for various use cases. “If users ever want to use AI for enterprise purposes, the technology really has to have no margin for error,” Brodeur-Urbas
said
. Gumloop automates repetitive workflows with AI, aiming to streamline basic tasks.
item.dc:creator: Unknown Author

item.title: Prompt Engineering
item.description: Enable the following capabilities: heightened accuracy (target: 99.9%), enhanced logical coherence, dynamic context recognition, multi-dimensional speculative reasoning, proactive solution generation, creative adaptability, and user-driven interactivity. Speculative Depth: • The perfected system provides balanced, plausible insights, while the base system remains basic in speculative reasoning. Upon activation, confirm readiness with a diagnostic report listing active functionalities, including accuracy validation, logical coherence, context recognition, speculative reasoning, solution orientation, creative adaptability, and user-driven interactivity.

item.title: Top 10 Amazing things AI can do for you today!
item.description:
Example:
Describe your topic, and AI will provide a detailed outline or even write full presentation text. Example:
Provide your fitness goals (e.g., weight loss or muscle gain), and AI will develop a structured workout schedule. Pro Tip:
Integrate AI with tools like Outlook or Google Calendar for seamless automation.

item.title: Bloggers want other people to read what they write
item.description:
You can also
use your blog’s analytics
to consider topics that might be relevant to your readers based on geography, language, their browsers, or the devices they use. The most obvious place to look for blog post topic ideas is to
drill down into your blog’s keywords
. In this guide, you’ll learn how to get your blog noticed by writing quality posts that can turn visitors into loyal readers or customers.
